thread.title: Luci Original Inflatable Solar Light by Mpowerd
thread.title_full: Luci Original Inflatable Solar Light by Mpowerd - San Francisco Chronicle

author: April Orcutt
title: Luci Original Inflatable Solar Light by Mpowerd
text:
Photo: Amazon.com print_article_embed|photo-8500847|article-6470415|7 comments_jump_embed|photo-8500847|article-6470415|1 email_share_embed|photo-8500847|article-6470415|1 facebook_share_embed|photo-8500847|article-6470415|2 twitter_share_embed|photo-8500847|article-6470415|3 pinterest_share_embed|photo-8500847|article-6470415|4 reddit_share_embed|photo-8500847|article-6470415|5 google_share_embed|photo-8500847|article-6470415|6 Luci Original Inflatable Solar Light by Mpowerd Luci Original Inflatable Solar Light by Mpowerd
Trying to illuminate your campsite at night without wearing a dorky flashlight-headband and without blinding (and irritating) your neighbors with what, in the blackness of a peaceful campground, seems like a 1,000-watt Coleman lantern has been a challenge. The Luci inflatable solar lantern helps solve this. Its 5-inch-diameter silver disk has solar panels and an on-off switch on one side and 10 LED lights on the other. A heavy plastic blow-up cylindrical “bulb” sits on top of the LEDs and inflates to 4 inches tall. It charges in eight hours of direct sunlight and shines brightly for hours. Luci Original Inflatable Solar Light by Mpowerd Luci Original Inflatable Solar Light by Mpowerd
